author: SoundGarden
description: Automated announcements for SoundGarden's Collab Warz music competition with AI-powered message generation, flexible weekly/bi-weekly scheduling, and integrated voting system
install_msg: Thanks for installing CollabWarz! Use `[p]cw status` to get started. Set your announcement channel with `[p]cw setchannel #channel-name`. Enable bi-weekly mode with `[p]cw biweekly` for 2-week cycles.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
